flavor: His tremendous arcane magic was strong enough to save all of the spirits of the titans after Sargeras destroyed their physical forms.

flavor: Theme park? Tropical island? Fiery pit of despair? We've got something for everyone.

flavor: Shoot for the stars, but if you miss, aim for the enemy hero.

flavor:
"We've finally captured Yogg-Saron! How should we keep him contained?"

name: General Vezax
text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Gain 4 Armor. Deathrattle: Lose 4 Armor to resummon this.

flavor: "I shall hug him and squeeze him and call him Earthen George."
name: Battleworn Faceless
targetingArrowText: Transform into a copy of it.
text: Battlecry: Transform into a copy of a damaged minion.

flavor: We were originally going to make a joke about a popular streamer, but one of our designers is a total germaphobe.
name: Sanitize
text: [x]Deal damage equal to your Armor to all minions. Forge: Gain 3 Armor first.

flavor: No! My rock-hard chiseled abs!
name: Curse of Flesh
text: Enemy minions cost Health instead of Mana next turn.

flavor: "Hey this isn't what we were trying to excavate!"
name: Bestial Madness
text:
[x]Give +1 Attack to all
minions in your hand,
deck, and battlefield.

flavor: Not currently valid in the Twist format.
name: Twisted Frostwing
text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon a Chimaera with stats equal to this minion's Attack.

flavor: The Old Gods like to think of them as "Addendums."
name: Void Scripture
text: Discover a spell. If you have enough Mana to play it, cast a copy of it at a random enemy.

flavor: I hope it’s the first one.
name: Twilight Torrent
text: Choose a character. If it's friendly, restore #6 Health. If it's an enemy, deal $3 damage.

flavor: Finders keepers, losers DIE.
name: Keeper's Strength
text:
Give a friendly minion +2/+2. Deal
its Attack damage to
all other minions.

flavor:
THREAT LEVEL: 5!
Which doesn't actually sound that bad to be honest.
name: Alarmed Securitybot
text: [x]Deathrattle: Draw another minion. Set its Attack, Health, and Cost to 5.

flavor: "Sorry, Squirmy. I'm working."
name: Runes of Darkness
text: Discover a weapon. Spend 3 Corpses to give it +1/+1.

flavor: Anyone want some CHEEEEEESE?
name: Sickly Grimewalker
text: [x]After you summon an Undead, give it Poisonous.

flavor: Also a pretty neat night light!
name: Sinister Soulcage
text: [x]Give a friendly Undead +2/+2. Spend 5 Corpses to summon a copy of it.

flavor: "So are you good, evil, or neutral?" "Just chaotic."
name: Chaotic Tendril
text: Battlecry: Cast a random 1-Cost spell. Improve your future Chaotic Tendrils.

flavor: Aye aye aye (OF CHAOS)
name: Eye of Chaos
text: Battlecry: Get two 1/1 Chaotic Tendrils.

flavor: Has been known to monologue before he strikes.
name: Yogg-Saron, Unleashed
text: [x]Titan After this uses an ability, cast two random spells.

flavor: It's a messy job but somebody's got to do it. Well, actually, nobody should do this.

text:
At the end of your turn,
get a 1/1 Chaotic Tendril.

flavor: A sore sight of eyesores for sore eyes.

flavor:
Captain's Log. 8/11/2023
There are 60 minutes remaining until the Flavor Text is due. It is Friday at 4 PM. We are out of stamina and ideas. Please send funnies, punnies, quippies, or your finest hahas.
- The Design Team

hero and get a random
